pages.text: The $(mob)Sandy Cicaptera$() is an animal found in $(thing)Deserts$(). Like other Cicapteras, it wanders around and flees when hit. Its meat is a decent source of food although it can be hard to catch and to kill due to its shell.$(p)It can be bred with $(item)Cactus$(), and can bred with any other Cicaptera.
$(mob)Sandy Cicapteras$() drop $(item)Sandy Cicaptera Husks$() on death. It is used as a yellow dye, and as such is used to paint various items yellow, like $(l:minecraft_sheep)$(mob)Wool$().
